gist.headline: Traffic Control for AI
gist.blurb: A new tool called AI Router has joined the Dev_Tools collection. It handles API keys and directs traffic like a pro.
gist.summary: Added AI Router to the Dev_Tools collection, a utility for issuing API keys and routing requests across multiple services.
gist.impact: Developers can now access AI Router within the apps directory to manage API keys and request routing.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a traffic controller or network engineer. The key symbols are a pixelated network router (blinking lights) and old-school skeleton keys (representing API keys). The bee is connecting a cable or holding a key.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot connecting a cable to a tiny pixelated network router with blinking lights. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Floating pixel keys and data packets around the bee. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'ROUTER'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
